name: Gotta Go!
description:
Gotta Go!

Dropped in a random maze, energy is running out and it gets darker by the second.

Find power ups to keep Your energy (seen in lower right corner), use the arrows in upper right corner to locate a lightbulbs (smaller arrows = closer to target) to regain some light. Jump over holes in the ground to avoid death.

Oh, and every 4-8 seconds an evil clone of You spawns and start following Your path, litterally but they are not the sharpest tools in the shed.

Use arrows or WASD + SPACE to make Your way through the maze.

All code, graphics and sound by the author.
